> "I trust him"said Kup while he sent the location to Megatron "His 
> siblings have served under Rodimus's command as hi did"

Legacy stood for a moment observing Kup, Legacy's single optic dimming in thought. Finally though he turned away and examined the skyline, silent and brooding, wondering at the logic of serving with a team that served with Megatron.

(TAG: Any)

Preston
